metadata.title: CVE-2024-29156 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In OpenStack Murano through 16.0.0, when YAQL before 3.0.0 is used, theMurano service's MuranoPL extension to the YAQL language fails to sanitizethe supplied environment, leading to potential leakage of sensitive serviceaccount information.

criterions.comment: murano package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
